hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r ".file_path // empty"); if [[ "$FILE" == *".opencode/specs/state.json"* ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *".opencode/specs/TODO.md"* ]]; then echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\", \"reason\": \"State file write - sync validation will run post-write\"}"; else echo "{\"decision\": \"allow\"}"; fi'

bash -c 'FILE=$(echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | jq -r ".file_path // empty"); if [[ "$FILE" == *".opencode/specs/state.json"* ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *".opencode/specs/TODO.md"* ]]; then echo "[StateSync] Updated: $FILE"; fi'
